column=500;
interface=100;
shock=80;

rho_3 = 1.1201;	1.12013558278482
u_3 = 0.6333;	0.633296014373567
p_3 = 1.1657;	1.16566595251631
phi_3=0
gamma=1.35;
M_s=1.5;

rho_1=1
u_1=0.5
p_1=1
phi_1=0


rho_2=0.0875
u_2=0.5
p_2=1
phi_2=1


1.0851884051296552,0.6707605869411877,0.0894533972506451,1.1168394751099269
left shock / right rarefaction

gamma=1.35

S0 = 0.5+sqrt(gamma)*sqrt((gamma+1)/2/gamma*1.165666+(gamma-1)/2/gamma)
= 1.74284250579334


SL = 0.633296-sqrt(gamma*1.165666/1.1201356)*sqrt((gamma+1)/2/gamma*1.1168394751/1.165666+(gamma-1)/2/gamma)
=-0.530171100619325

collision time 0.002*20/(1.7428425-0.5)=0.0322

shock position 80*0.002 + 0.0322*1.7428425 - (0.07-0.0322)*0.5301711 = 0.19608

gamma=5
SHR = 0.5+sqrt(gamma*1/0.0875)
=8.0593
STR = 0.670760587+sqrt(gamma*1/0.0875)*(1.1168394751/1)^((gamma-1)/2/gamma)
=8.5717

interface position 80*0.002 + 0.0322*1.7428425 + (0.07-0.0322)*0.67076 = 0.2415

HR position 80*0.002 + 0.0322*1.7428425 + (0.07-0.0322)*8.0593 = 0.5208
TR position 80*0.002 + 0.0322*1.7428425 + (0.07-0.0322)*8.5717 = 0.5401
